wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[1 January|1]]''' - Actor [[Leon Wadham]] is born.
* '''[[30 January|30]]''' - ''[[Tolkien's Legendarium]]'' is published.
* '''[[30 January|30]]''' - Actress [[Markella Kavenagh]] is born.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 161]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - [[Other Hands 28]] is published.

==March==
* '''[[19 March|19]]''' - Actor [[Fraser Kerr]] dies.
* '''[[29 March|29]]''' - ''[[Tyalie Tyelellieva]]'' issue 14 is published.
==May==
* '''[[21 May|21]]''' - [[Minastirith.com]] is founded.
==June==
* '''[[28 June|28]]''' - The [[Tolkien Ensemble]] publish their second album, ''[[A Night in Rivendell]]''. 
==July==
* '''[[20 July|20]]''' - The second [[Tolkien Thing]] is held.
* '''?''' - [[Vinyar Tengwar 41]] is published.
* '''?''' - [[Other Hands 29/30]] is published.

==August==
* '''[[18 August|18]]-[[21 August|21]]''' - [[Mythcon 31]].

==September==
* '''[[5 September|5]]''' - ''[[Tyalie Tyelellieva]]'' issue 15 is published.
* '''[[22 September|22]]-[[24 September|24]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 2000]].
* '''[[30 September|30]]''' - ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien and His Literary Resonances]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[The End of the Third Age]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: Author of the Century]]'' is published.

==November==
* '''[[6 November|6]]''' - Author [[L. Sprague de Camp]] dies.
* '''[[23 November|23]]''' - [[Rayner Unwin]], the first reader of ''[[The Hobbit]]'', dies.
==December==
* '''[[22 December|22]]''' - Principal photography for [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)]] ends.
* '''[[23 December|23]]''' - Actor [[Billy Barty]] dies.
* '''[[26 December|26]]''' - Actor [[Michael Deacon]] dies.
* '''[[26 December|26]]''' - Composer [[Paul Kont]] dies.

==?==
* '''?''' - ''[[Lord of the Rings (board game)]]'' is released.
* '''?''' - The first trailer ''[[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|The Lord of the Rings film series]]'' is released online.
